channel.title: Others can't connect to my server
channel.description:
Hello :) I used this Tutorial [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html[/url] 1)I Compile everytime before i put Runserver.bat up 2) I Forwarded a Port(In the tut) 3) I run my NO-IP(& Update it) 4) I run Runserver.bat
What is wrong ? This is an image of where i forwarded the Port [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/9430/aascreenportum6.png[/img]
A friend is trying to connect to the server but it says the Server is offline I know i can log in , so don't tell me that I just want to know why others can't connect , Maybe my friend does something wrong with connecting ? if so , i would like to ask anyone on this forum to connect to my server (not to advertise , just to check) The NO-IP host i used is Heavenspk.no-ip.info , and yes i only have 1 no-ip host .. Thanks in advance :D

item.title: Others can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

[quote=“Gazmask, post:23, topic:155339”]Well , maybe thats possible ( I’m not sure )
Because on the tutorial it says i have to set the ‘To IP Adress’ to My IP … but the default IP i get is 192.168.2.X , i can only change the X
If thats not it , i don’t see anything wrong …[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 08:19:56 AM[/size][hr]My server is online everyone !
Thanks who helped me !
I had to change the 192.168.2.1 in the Port Forwarding to 192.168.2.2 - -’’[/quote]

Your welcome for the help!
Remember to come back if there’s anything else you need help with

Read full topic
item.source: Others can't connect to my server

item.title: Others can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

Well , maybe thats possible ( I’m not sure )
Because on the tutorial it says i have to set the ‘To IP Adress’ to My IP … but the default IP i get is 192.168.2.X , i can only change the X
If thats not it , i don’t see anything wrong …[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 08:19:56 AM[/size][hr]My server is online everyone !
Thanks who helped me !
I had to change the 192.168.2.1 in the Port Forwarding to 192.168.2.2 - -’’

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

[quote=“Tbh I Own, post:20, topic:155339”]Didn’t answer the question I gave you

[quote author=Tbh I Own link=topic=212055.msg1853995#msg1853995 date=1193684660]
Have you tried doing the port forward again? - maybe you missed a step, I missed a step when I first port forwarded…

ehm wth ?

[/quote][/quote]

To me, it sounds like you’ve set it up, but missed a step on port forwarding maybe, I could be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Others can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

[quote=“Tbh I Own, post:20, topic:155339”][quote author=Gazmask link=topic=212055.msg1854004#msg1854004 date=1193684886]
Sorry for bumping lol XD
I did that alot on Runescape Forums
But the reason i actually do this is because as long as my server aint up , my friends keep spamming me with like ‘When is it going to be up?’ ‘Can i be mod’ ‘How will the server look like?’ ‘Take a picture of the Server!’ Its such annoying
[/quote]

Didn’t answer the question I gave you

[quote author=Tbh I Own link=topic=212055.msg1853995#msg1853995 date=1193684660]
Have you tried doing the port forward again? - maybe you missed a step, I missed a step when I first port forwarded…
[/quote][/quote]
ehm wth ?
Fine i’ll Redo the Tut …
I’m still hopeless and kinda sure i did the whole tut right

Read full topic

item.title: Others can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

[quote=“Gazmask, post:17, topic:155339”]I tried that ( Putting off my firewall )
And yes , he connects to the default Port (43594)
I’ll try to make a new no-IP ( Question : only the host or a new acc ? )
[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 07:26:42 AM[/size][hr]By the way : what do i need to choose here ?
Host Type:
DNS Host (A)<<(Default , i always choose that one)
DNS Host (Round Robin)
DNS Alias (CNAME)
Port 80 Redirect
Web Redirect[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 07:31:38 AM[/size][hr]Okay , made a new NO-IP host now , still not working[/quote]

Eh, don’t bump your topic - it’ll only get you a warn or mute…

And have you tried doing the port forward again? - maybe you missed a step, I missed a step when I first port forwarded…

Read full topic

and make sure your friend connects to 43594.

item.title: Others can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:13, topic:155339”]I mean get em all… go to Command Prompt

better yet if you cant find command prompt

make a new batch file inside it write

@echo off
ipconfig /all
pause

save it as findrouter.bat run it

you will have a few default gateway’s and dns servers try em all until 1 works.[/quote]
Did that , the only one that works is 192.168.2.1

Read full topic
item.source: Others can't connect to my server

item.title: Others can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

I mean get em all… go to Command Prompt

better yet if you cant find command prompt

make a new batch file inside it write

@echo off
ipconfig /all
pause

save it as findrouter.bat run it

you will have a few default gateway’s and dns servers try em all until 1 works.

Read full topic
